title.rendered: New project- Consultancy services under  “Knowledge for Reform Action in the Western Balkans” project

content.rendered:
support UNOPS in strengthening institutional, administrative and legislative frameworks and practices related to EU integration in six countries in the Western Balkans region through provision of tailored consultancy services on EU accession negotiation process and harmonization.

Scope of work:

Technical expertise/advice related to EU accession negotiation process, e.g. preparation of presentations for screening meetings, meeting the requirements of the opening benchmarks, development of strategic and policy documents, development of accession negotiation documents etc.

Technical expertise/advice related to specific clusters/chapters of the EU acquis, e.g. policy mapping, harmonization, approximation and standardization of legislation, policy development and evaluation, gap analysis, needs assessment etc.

The Technical Assistance project is managed by PAI consortium, financed by UNOPS
